item.title: Oil rises as Trump says Iran will be held responsible for any future Houthi attacks
item.description: Houthi strikes have forced international shipping companies to re-route container ships that would normally pass through the Red Sea and Suez Canal.

item.title: Trump economic advisor Kevin Hassett warns of more uncertainty over tariffs
item.description: President Donald Trump has shrugged off calls for more clarity about his policies, even as they stoke turmoil in the markets.

item.title: U.S. piles pressure on Yemen's Houthis with new airstrikes
item.description: The United States carried out new airstrikes on Yemen on Monday, the Houthis' Al Masirah TV said.

item.title: Trump says he will speak with Putin on Tuesday about ending war in Ukraine
item.description: U.S. President Donald Trump said he plans to speak to Russian President Vladimir Putin on Tuesday.

item.title: Trump launches large-scale strikes on Yemen's Houthis, at least 19 killed
item.description: At least 19 were killed as U.S. President Donald Trump launched large-scale military strikes against Yemen's Iran-aligned Houthis on Saturday.
